content: round 3 work a 3dc-cluster instead of the 3trc-cluster for round 2 roun d 3 join in any ch2-space ch1 this does not count as a st 3sc in the same space 3sc in the next ch2-space 11 times join to the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 36sc roun d 4 join in any st ch2 this counts as the 1st half_double_crochet 1hdc in the same st 1hdc in each of the next 2sts 2hdc in the next st 1hdc in each of the next 2sts 11 times join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 48hdc 18 roun d 5 working blo join in any st ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc in the same st 1sc in each of the next 10sts ch2 skip st 1sc in each of the next 11sts ch2 skip st 3 times join to the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 44sc 4 ch2-spaces 19 roun d 6 join in any ch2-space ch2 1dc in the same space this counts as the 1st 2dc-cluster ch2 2dc-cluster in the same space 3 times ch3 *sk4st s your 1st st will be hidden by your corners so be careful not to sk5sts 1sc in each of the next 3sts ch3 sk4sts 2dc-cluster in the next ch2-space ch2 2dc-cluster in the same space 3 times ch3 * repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting the last corner join to the top of the beginning 2dc-cluster with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 3sc 2 ch3-spaces per side 4 2dc-cluster 3 ch2-spaces in each corner 20 roun d 7 join in the centre ch2-space of any corner ch2 this counts as the 1st half_double_crochet 1hdc ch2 2hdc in the same space *2hdc in the next ch2-space 3hdc in the ch3-space 1hdc in each of the next 3sts 3hdc in the ch3- space 2hdc in the ch2-space 2hdc ch2 2hdc in the centre ch2-space of the corner * repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting the last corner join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 13hdc per side 2hdc ch2 2hdc in each corner round 8 join in any corner space ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc ch2 1sc in the same space *skip the hidden st 1sc in each of the next 16sts 1sc ch2 1sc in the corner space * repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting the last corner join to the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 16sc per side 1sc ch2 1sc in each corner 21 roun d 9 note join a few stitches away from your corner for a neater finish remember to watch your gauge or go up half a hook size join ar ound the post of any st of round
